item.title: theninja
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Wizardry 8 class: the Ninja Best Race: Felpurr: very good SPE, decend DEX/SEN Hobbit: good SEN, DEX and decent SPE, most bonus points. Fairy: Very good INT, Ok DEX/SEN. For Cane of Corpus the best weapon (1handled short-range staff, Don Barlone in Trynton) Mook: very good DEX, SEN. Downside: Very low SPE & humans of course Controlling attriubutes: Senses (max ASAP for Eagle Eye!) Dexterity (max ASAP, controlling attrib for many skills) Speed (more hits per round & Initiative for using gadgets) Intelligence (controlling attrib for traps & alchemy magic) As a ninja, you have access to the thrown criticals special skill.
